attributes.title: No.✨
attributes.review: I download this app and I hated it so I tried sending a review but it wouldn’t let me:(✨ the reasons I hate this app is cus when you open the app you see a pic of a racist pig with his fist in the air like- take that fat hand down😌😆💅🏽✨😳😂ok im done bye luvs hope this app gets taken down😻😆😗👺✨😳😂🦵🏽

attributes.title: Don’t Download if ur not white ❌🙅🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: I love Donald J Trump but I have to say I’m wasn’t very thrilled about this app as soon as I downloaded this app it crashed and ICE showed up to my house 😔💔 I’m currently in Mexico which is very heartbreaking as Trump has made it very clear he loves his hispanic citizens just as much 😢

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I opened up the app and immediately it was incredibly disorganized and literally was the worst attempt at making an app. Some highschool student could for sure make a much better app than this one

attributes.title: ✨horrible✨
attributes.review: This app is literally horrible. I can’t even describe how bad it was. Trump’s face is still giving me nightmares and my phone is so traumatized from having the presence of this app on my phone that it barely even works anymore. Thanks a lot😡

attributes.title: ✨✨🧚🏼‍♂️Really Bad💫🧚🏼‍♂️✨
attributes.review: When I first opened the app Donald slapped me threw the screen and sent me to orbit😫. I came back to life 🧍🏽‍♀️from space and went to bed because I just💥 came back from space 🌞 and I was being haunted in me dreams🌟! I deleted the app. And it 🌟kept re-downloading itself.✨ DO NOT GET THIS APP IF YOU ARE A SECERE HUMAN THAT BREATHES AIR✨

attributes.title: Don’t download!! 🙅‍♀️
attributes.review: The second I opened this app after waiting a month for it to download my phone started glitching and trumps face would show over my screen for a millisecond... it won’t stop so I had to delete the app!!

attributes.title: UGLY STUPID DO NOT GET
attributes.review: first of all, it’s 17 and up so it won’t let the other political teens be able to have this app. another thing is we had to do way too many things to sign up for. the first thing i open to is why Joe Biden is bad, but i should be why Donald Trump is good.

attributes.title: It does not work
attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to support our ✨wonderful✨ president but it took 2 weeks to download!! After it finally did all that popped up on the screen were pictures of candles and soccer balls! Don’t download this app!! It does not work!!!!

attributes.title: Horrendous app
attributes.review: Honestly this app just ruins everyones lives and it shouldn’t exist. I have never had an app that encourages theft, suicide and all of the above. The person who made this app might wanna ruin the whole country and overtake the world with their bad intentions. Unacceptable, worst app I have ever used.

attributes.title: absolute worst app to exist on the face of the earth.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see some exclusive pictures of donald tump and was greatly disappointed. i was left with limited features and deleted the app. i wish i could rate it lower 💔 anyways stan charli for clear skin
